revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=SolidRun |model=HummingBoard Edge |revision=Quad (REV 1.4) |manuf_country=Israel |is_manuf=Yes |price=180 |est_release_date=04/2017 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=7-36 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6Q |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1GETF-B041 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646E-BYK0 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, NGFF M.2, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J25 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C RTC;NXP;PCF8523;;1;,,, Dual Non-inverting Buffer;ON Semi;NLX2G16;;1;,,, 12-bit 4-channel ADC w/I2C Interface;TI;ADS7924;;1;,,, 2-Channel SPDT Bidirectional Analog Switch;TI;TS3A5223;;1;,,, 3A 36V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT2875B;;2;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hi-Speed Hub Controller;Microchip;USB2514Bi;;1;,,, ESD Protection Diode for High Speed Data Line;ON Semi;ESD7004;;3;,,, .5A Dual Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2156;;2;,,, 250mA CMOS Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;Taiwan Semiconductor;TS9011;;2; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, LVDS, GPIO, RTC w/ battery, IR receiver, Audio In/Out (3.5mm), SIM Card slot |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware=Armbian }} {{TagLine|HummingBoard Edge Quad 1GHz i.MX6}} :[https://www.solid-run.com/nxp-family/hummingboard/ Product page] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' i.MX6Q ''Quad'' :@1GHz Quad-Core (ARM Cortex A9) *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC2000 / GC320 :Video decoding 1080p60 H.264 *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 8GB eMMC 5.1 HS400, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Video Output: MIPI DSI, LVDS and HDMI *Audio Output: Analog via 3.5mm *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 *PCIe: 1x M.2 for SSD (2242, Key B), :1x mini PCIe w/ SIM support *GPIO: 1x 24-pin header, 1x 12-pin header *Power Source: 7-36V barrel plug, recommended 12V/2A ==Images== ---- File:SolidRun HummingBoard Edge Quad Top.jpeg|Board Top File:SolidRun HummingBoard Edge Quad Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
